Text:
Saw this at the cinema - gentle but shocking, and recommended for those who enjoy period drama and arthouse. Clever use of sixties music.

English subs: http://subscene.com/english/House-of-Tolerance-AKA-House-of-Pleasures-LApollonide-Souvenirs-de-la-maison-close-2011/subtitle-551493.aspx
